EmailTemplate.subject: How much bandwidth is just right for you?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s the old Goldilocks analogy at 40,000 feet.
To give business jet passengers the fast, reliable Wi-Fi they need, you have to pick an airtime service plan that’s not too small or too big to meet your needs. But choosing a “just right” plan is tougher than it sounds.
Unless you choose a Honeywell Forge airtime service plan. Honeywell Forge is our all-new, all-inclusive cabin connectivity and flight service platform. Our seasoned team of experts is ready to help you pick a service plan <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/07/how-much-bandwidth-does-your-business-jet-need?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_bga&utm_content=nurture]]> to meet your specific needs and avoid the sticker shock that comes with unexpected overage charges <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2020/03/say-goodbye-data-sticker-shock?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_bga&utm_content=nurture]]>.
Honeywell Forge works with any satellite communications hardware, including our industry-leading JetWave SATCOM system, which uses the Inmarsat Ka-Band network to give you the best Wi-Fi in the sky.
